summary: Sgt. Beckett's last mission sends him to a remote war-torn wasteland between Eastern Europe and Asia to assassinate a repressive terrorist leader. Once the job is done, Beckett and his spotter find escaping more difficult than anticipated.
cast: Tom Berenger|Bokeem Woodbine|Erika Marozsán|Tamás Puskás|Dan Butler|Linden Ashby|Barna Illyés|Ferenc Kovács|Dennis Hayden|Can Togay|Béla Jáki|László Áron|Lukács Bicskey|Zoltán Seress|Tas Szöllösi|Ben O'Brien|Andrew Hefler|Peter Linka|Ákos Horváth|Ray Valentine|Matt Devere|István Göz|László Szili|Erzsébet Szloboda|Gabriella Suki|Péter Behan
keywords: second part|part two|camouflage|reference to slobodan milosevic|reference to guantanamo bay cuba
title: Beckett. La última misión
